title: Life expectancy in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: In general Life expectancy at birth in years has stayed the same over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2012.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Life expectancy at birth in years, about 75.19 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Life expectancy at birth in years about 74.97 was reached at Year 2012
min_summary: In general Life expectancy at birth in years has stayed the same over the Year.

mid_summary: Overall Life expectancy at birth in years has decreased over the Year.
